question:
Consider the following statements about the Scheme for Adolescent Girls:
  1. This scheme aims at the all-round development of girls in the age-group of 14-18 years by making them self-reliant
  2. Rapid Reporting System is a web-based portal developed by the National Informatics Centre (NIC) for online monitoring of the scheme
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The Scheme for Adolescent Girls aims at all-round development of adolescent girls (11-18 years) by making them self-reliant, improving their health and nutrition status and upgrading skills. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. Recently, the National Informatics Centre developed the Rapid Reporting System, an online portal for monitoring of the scheme. The scheme has two major components viz. Nutrition and Non-Nutrition. Under the Nutrition component of the scheme, the out of school adolescent girls in the age group of 11-14 years and all girls in the age group of 14-18 years attending Anganwadi Centres are provided Supplementary Nutrition in the form of Take Home Ration or Hot Cooked Meals.
